heading: Tonight
text: Periods of clouds north, and through the mountains. Mostly clear in southern valleys. Lows from 5 to 15 below zero. Northwest wind diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Saturday
text: Sunshine with mixed clouds north, more sunshine south. Not as cold. Highs in the upper single digits to low teens north, into the upper teens south. Light northwest wind.

heading: Saturday Night
text: Mostly clear with passing clouds. Lows from 5 to 10 below, topping out near 0 in the south. Light northeast wind.
